```{r}
#| label: setup

options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "100%",
  dpi = 300,
  fig.align = "center"
)


if (!require("countdown")) install.packages("countdown")

library(countdown)

library(here)

include_local_figure <- function(data_source) {
  knitr::include_graphics(
    path = here::here(
      "Materials",
      data_source
    ),
    error = TRUE
  )
}
```
